channel.title: [562] Range [562]
channel.description:
Ok i have range weapons but when i use them on the server the character will run up to the npc and melle it/ punch it, how can i make the weapons: 1. no need to run up - far range 2. give range xp when used and range/def on long range setting.
please help!
I have looked all over google and moparscape for help but no luck.
